author: James Kao
text: The most underrated, unsuspecting feature of the future is the advent of recursively self-improving machine intelligence outpacing biological evolution and human innovation. Few realize and understand the necessity to mitigate this risk.

author: Peter Thiel
text: Brilliant thinking is rare, but courage is in even shorter supply than genius.

author: Reid Hoffman
text: If you're not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you've launched too late.

author: Paul Graham
text: For the most ambitious young people, the corporate ladder is obsolete.

author: Jeff Hammerbacher
text: The best minds of my generation are thinking about how to make people click ads. That sucks.
